item.title: War Quiz - 03-11-2023

item.title: Get Started!
item.description: A collection of online (and offline) resources that, in my opinion, are ideal for anyone who wishes to start tinkering. The list is continually being updated as I encounter good resources out there in the wild. General Websites Reference for guided tutorials, theory, project ideas, and news pertinent to the hobbyist electronics community. Electronics-Tutorial : Simple, clean tutorial site. The topics are not arranged in an ideal sequence, in my opinion, but it is still a great first reference.

item.title: Electrons are weird
item.description: Tinkering and playing around with electronics is just about my main hobby - or atleast it used to be. I’m working on regaining my skills, now that I have the time to do so. Index

item.title: Tunak Tunak Tun
item.description: I don’t have anything that I would like to put up here right now - so here is my last.fm, and here is my RYM. I hope to talk about the music that I listen to here, soon!
